p: Helicobacter pylori (ATCC 43504) (100 μL) of 20% ( v/v) bacterial suspensions were incubated with Mueller–Hinton broth for 24 h at 37 °C with 100 μL of several concentrations of EO as well as clarithromycin as positive control in 96 well plate. Then, the MTT protocol was applied using the abovementioned cytotoxicity assay [ 35].
